alled a cloverleaf skull.  The term thanatophoric is Greek for ""death bearing."" Infants with thanatophoric dysplasia are usually stillborn or die shortly after birth from respiratory failure; however, a few affected individuals have survived into childhood with extensive medical help.",GHR,thanatophoric dysplasia
How many people are affected by thanatophoric dysplasia ?,"This condition occurs in 1 in 20,000 to 50,000 newborns. Type I thanatophoric dysplasia is more common than type II.",GHR,th
